WRITING.TITLE: Need recommendations for a new anime
WRITING.TEXT: Any recommendations for a great show that is similar to Psycho Pass? Just marathoned in and fooking loved it.
Take my up vote you sly sonovabitch

I think an ability to never require sleep would be phenomenal, The average human spends 1/3 of their life sleeping, thats like adding 25 years of time to your life. When you think about it that way its pretty awesome.
You must eat your steak medium rare.
Scientology... no explanation should be required.
Golden Eagle hands down. Second would have to be a Snow Leopard
Yeah, I will admit though, the cool factor of that idea would be amazing, I would LOVE to see an ash army running around obliterating any and everything on the map lol

Grand Prix, 1966. Absolutely fantastic film that details Formula 1's early years. The rawness of how it was filmed and the capture of the amazing competition rivals, and sometimes surpasses todays racing films imo. Truly remarkable and if you're a fan of racing/formula 1/cars in general it is a must see.
Yes it was unique to say the least
